R

r - Variable in class com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.Computer
The interrupt raised flip-flop of this Computer.
r() - Method in class com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.Computer
 
ram - Variable in class com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.Computer
The RAM of this Computer.
ram() - Method in class com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.Computer
 
RAM - Class in com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation
Class representing RAM in Mano's computer as detailed in:
Computer System Architecture, 3rd edition
By M.
RAM() - Constructor for class com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.RAM
Constructor which is the equivalent of calling RAM.RAM(int, int) arguments Computer.ADDRESS_SIZE and Computer.VALUE_SIZE.
RAM(int, int) - Constructor for class com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.RAM
addressSize and valueSize must pass Computer.validateSize(int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
ramFX - Variable in class com.tomeraberbach.mano.application.Main
TableView where the current state of RAM will be displayed.
read(int) - Method in class com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.RAM
address must pass RAM.validateAddress(int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
Register - Class in com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation
Class representing a register in Mano's computer as detailed in:
Computer System Architecture, 3rd edition
By M.
Register() - Constructor for class com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.Register
Constructor which is the equivalent of calling Register.Register(int) with an argument of 1.
Register(int) - Constructor for class com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.Register
size must pass Computer.validateSize(int) or an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
replaceLabels(ArrayList<String>) - Method in class com.tomeraberbach.mano.assembly.Compiler
Replaces any labelMap found after calling Compiler.generate() with their hex values in their respective Instruction instances in Compiler.instructions using Compiler.labelMap.
reset() - Method in class com.tomeraberbach.mano.simulation.Computer
Resets this Computer to its initial state which was right after its instantiation using Computer.Computer().
resetOnAction() - Method in class com.tomeraberbach.mano.application.Main
Called when the 'Reset' button is pressed.
rFX - Variable in class com.tomeraberbach.mano.application.Main
TextField where the value of the interrupt flip-flop will be displayed.
runFX - Variable in class com.tomeraberbach.mano.application.Main
ToggleButton for running and pausing the simulation.
runOnAction() - Method in class com.tomeraberbach.mano.application.Main
Called when the 'Run' button is toggled.
